title: TAFE Motors, DEUTZ AG ink pact; to expand internal combustion engine business
description: TAFE Motors and Tractors Ltd would produce engines to suit newer applications in the Indian market as well as for DEUTZ's requirement. The engines would be produced at the manufacturing facility of TAFE Motors at Alwar, Rajasthan. The manufacturing facility currently produces diesel engines and gensets in the 5 to 125 kVA range that are marketed as Eicher Engines and TMTL Engines.
